about_the_game:
In the year 1400 of the Devil Land, you're a middle-aged man at the bottom of the social ladder, living like a slave, muddled and unarmed. Want to change everything around you? The four Lords of the Magic Realm won't oblige. Come and try.


Gameplay: a first person role-playing game where you will play as an ordinary civilian of the Magic Realm, experiencing and trying to change the continent of the Magic Realm. Awaiting you are harsh battles and overlords in every realm. You must utilize your own battle strategies to keep yourself from dying in the wilderness. During the journey players will also meet like-minded companions, but of course, not many people like to mantle.

A classic RPG with strategic combat, hardcore difficulty, and a deep plot.

Profile


You are an ordinary citizen. Special abilities? Stop it. The ability to take a beating？

The game's author, whose true identity is that of a sorcerer from an alien planet, joins the team for unknown motives.

Nameless female swordsman with a bad attitude.

Imperial officer. “Gee, the officers are so unsettling.”

Imperial Sergeant. “We get death, the king gets rich.”

I would like to thank all my relatives and friends.
Player bug feedback email：18510415333@163.com

Process tip: the trial version process length of about 4 hours, the official version of the clearance process average 15 hours. (In order to inherit the archive, this game does not support steam cloud archive.)


The full version inherits the trial version archive method:
1.Right click on Devil Land RPG Demo in steam library.
2. Select Manage → Browse Local Files → Copy the save folder inside.
3.Use the same steps to browse the local files of Devil Land RPG (official version) and overwrite the save folder.

I look forward to your writing a review after you pass the game, which is favorable to the game's low-priced sales strategy, thank you for your support.

name: Devil Land RPG

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

reviews:
“Although the game has some problems, there are still commendable things, especially the gameplay and plot. There are also eggs such as lizard people and tomb aliens, so if you like old-fashioned RPGs, this game is worth checking out, but the author just wants to eat a pack of konjac cool to vent his fire.”
Rate：8.0 – 点击此处转到B站评测视频（Chinese review video）

supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Russian
